body: Amazon Romania is looking for an innovative, extremely hands-on, customer-obsessed Recruiter with a passion for candidate sourcing to join our highly professional recruiting team. If you thrive in a challenging and fast-paced environment, this is the place for you, as you will have a huge impact on Amazon's ability to manage the bottom-line by finding the right talent.As a Recruiter in Amazon you will:- Provide first-class, one-stop-shop recruiting support for internal customer groups in Romania and abroad throughout the full recruiting process;- Be THE expert in industry best practices around functional areas of recruitment, new trends and opportunities to consistently raise the bar on staffing deliverable;- Manage process to offer stage while ensuring an outstanding candidate experience;- Develop creative and effective sourcing strategies, plans and pipelines, screen in top-notch candidates across all areas of the organization;- Implement and enforce consistency with our recruiting policies and procedures;- Represent the company in recruiting events such as job fairs and other;- Ensure 100 % data accuracy of our recruitment database, track and analyze statistical recruiting data to determine effectiveness of all recruiting activities;- Conduct and track reference checks;- Deliver on several recruiting related projects.• A completed Bachelor's Degree is required, preferably in a Human Resources related field;• Exceptional analytical and process management skills, attention to detail;• Strong internal and external customer service focus, ability to proactively provide strategic staffing solutions;• Bias for action, strong work ethic, and desire to achieve excellence;• Excellent business judgment and time management skills;• Excellent written and oral communication skills in Romanian and English.• 1 plus years related corporate recruiting experience, with demonstrated success in meeting exceptionally high hiring standards in a high volume, fast-paced environment;
title: Fixed Term Recruiter
